滄.definition: (bound form) (of water, esp. the ocean) deep blue-green; (literary) cold

滄州.definition: see 滄州市|沧州市[Cang1zhou1 Shi4]

滄州市.definition: Cangzhou, prefecture-level city in Hebei Province 河北省[He2bei3 Sheng3]

滄桑.definition: great changes; ups and downs; vicissitudes; abbr. of 滄海桑田|沧海桑田[cang1 hai3 sang1 tian2]

滄桑感.definition: a sense of having been through good times and bad; a weathered and worn look

滄浪亭.definition: The Surging Waves Pavillion in Suzhou, Jiangsu

滄海一粟.definition: lit. one grain floating on the ocean (idiom); fig. a drop in the ocean

滄海桑田.definition: lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom); fig. the transformations of the world

滄源佤族自治縣.pinyin: cāng yuán wǎ zú zì zhì xiàn
滄源佤族自治縣.definition: Cangyuan Va Autonomous County in Lincang 臨滄|临沧[Lin2 cang1], Yunnan

滄源縣.definition: Cangyuan Va autonomous county in Lincang 臨滄|临沧[Lin2 cang1], Yunnan

滄縣.definition: Cang county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei
